titleStmt.title: Removed from Brown's Court in Shoe-lane, to the green ball and lamp in Salisbury Court, in Fleet-Street, being the corner house on the right hand (there is also a green ball at the back-door.) Liveth a physitian, who has a method that cures the French disease in a more easie way than can be expected ...

notesStmt.note: Title taken from caption and first lines of text.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
